question: What are the symptoms, causes, and treatment of Hypertension? (version 1)
symptoms: Often asymptomatic, headaches, shortness of breath, nosebleeds.
causes: Obesity, high salt intake, stress, genetics, sedentary lifestyle.
treatment: Lifestyle changes, antihypertensive medications, regular monitoring.
layman_explanation: High blood pressure often has no symptoms but can damage your heart and kidneys. It's managed with medicine and healthy habits.

question: What are the symptoms, causes, and treatment of Type 2 Diabetes? (version 1)
symptoms: Frequent urination, increased thirst, fatigue, blurry vision.
causes: Insulin resistance, obesity, poor diet, genetic predisposition.
treatment: Diet and exercise, oral medications, insulin therapy if needed.
layman_explanation: Type 2 diabetes happens when your body can’t use sugar properly. It’s controlled with diet, exercise, and medicine.

question: What are the symptoms, causes, and treatment of COPD? (version 1)
symptoms: Shortness of breath, chronic cough, wheezing, fatigue.
causes: Smoking, long-term exposure to air pollutants, genetic factors.
treatment: Bronchodilators, steroids, oxygen therapy, lifestyle changes.
layman_explanation: COPD makes it hard to breathe because of damaged lungs. It’s caused mainly by smoking and treated with breathing medicines.

question: What are the symptoms, causes, and treatment of Asthma? (version 2)
symptoms: Wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness, coughing.
causes: Airway inflammation from allergens, exercise, or cold air.
treatment: Inhalers, avoiding triggers, steroids.
layman_explanation: Asthma makes breathing hard. Inhalers help open the lungs.

question: What are the symptoms, causes, and treatment of Chronic Kidney Disease? (version 3)
symptoms: Fatigue, swollen ankles, nausea, poor appetite.
causes: Diabetes, high blood pressure, infections.
treatment: Control underlying cause, dialysis, kidney transplant.
layman_explanation: Kidney disease means the kidneys aren’t working well. It can get worse over time.

question: What are the symptoms, causes, and treatment of Arthritis? (version 4)
symptoms: Joint pain, stiffness, swelling, reduced range of motion.
causes: Autoimmune reaction, wear and tear, infections.
treatment: Pain relief meds, physical therapy, joint surgery.
layman_explanation: Arthritis causes painful, stiff joints. Treatment can ease symptoms.

question: What are the symptoms, causes, and treatment of Asthma? (version 86)
symptoms: Wheezing, shortness of breath, chest tightness, coughing.
